title: Honor level problem
body:
Hello
Im having problems with the honor system.
Im honor level 2 at the last checkpoint since the start of season 8 because I was honor level 5 last season.The game just does not give me honor lvl 3 even tho im getting honors almost every single game and im nice most of the time(If not I mute all to not even start a fight).
What do you think?{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} I would like to add a picture where it says recently I've gotten 41 honors but If I paste it there I can not post the Discussion.

replies.body: honor is.... well slower then death, but you reach a check point around every 20 games.
Hmm... probably not playing enough games.
If you get reported and the instant feedback system considers the report valid, but not enough to warrant a punishment, it will still slow your honor progress. Maybe that's the cause.
